promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive special cat normal-type pokemon wearing a dark mask. It can be found in village-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or cat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Maskapur, a a massive special cat normal-type pokemon. It can be found in village-like environments It has the following abilities: Judgment. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "cat", "normal" or "Maskapur". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, cat-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pastel colors
generatedDescription: Discover Maskapur: a majestic feline guardian dwelling in quaint villages, casting Judgment to ensure harmony and balance within its beloved community.
